adjective.definition: Found or distributed over a large area or number of people.
adjective.example: There was widespread support for the proposal.

noun.definition: The quality or state of being widespread.
noun.example: The widespreadness of the panic was evident.

verb.definition: To make widespread; to spread widely (rare/non-standard).
verb.example: They aimed to widespread the new policy.

usage_examples: There is widespread agreement on this issue.
